item.description:
Pot Luck Supper: Spring Theme

What is a Spring Theme? 

I don't know, but with Spring around the corner it certainly sounded better than a winter theme! Possibly deviled eggs, a coloful pasta salad, ham, a crisp leafy salad with assorted veggies, or maybe finger sandwiches, just to name a few thoughts!

I suspect Spring food could consist of a lighter more colorful flair!

Everyone Bring a Dish: Main Course ,Salad, Side, or Dessert.

3 Women Choose a Main Course : Chicken, Beef, Fish, etc.

2 Women Choose Salad: Tossed, Potato, Macaroni, etc.

3 Women Choose Sides: Potatoes, Rice, Veggies.

2 Women Choose Dessert!

1 Woman to bring paper goods.

IMPORTANT!!!! PLEASE PAY ATTENTION: WHEN YOU RESERVE PLEASE ADD A NOTE AS TO WHAT TYPE OF COURSE YOU ARE BRINGING AND WHAT IT IS SO IT WON'T BE REPEATED. IF ALL THE MAIN COURSES ARE TAKEN, DO NOT PICK THIS, GO TO ANOTHER CATEGORY. THE SAME GOES FOR SALADS, SIDES AND DESSERTS.

BYOB! or Please bring what you would like to drink ..

*** I'm not attending because I'll be away on Vaca, however, Barb and Doreen will be hooping it up while I'm gone!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Potluck Supper-Spring theme!
